name: CardJacks
description:
CardJacks is a 21st century card game app like no other. New rules and unique mechanics makes this the most original card game in many years.

Learn how to play CardJacks.  3 instructional videos

I would sure appreciate your support.

There are 7 basic moves. These are very easy to pick up and soon you will be creating your own unique strategies.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzhcVEVgIQiEx0RrpHnZQzw

Coming soon to cardjacks.com

We have a version of the game ready to play now. There is a Play mode and a Play AI mode.

The AI mode is very basic and incomplete. Soon it will be much more sophisticated and running smoothly.

I suggest for now, while you are learning to play the game, tap/click on the Play button.

With this version, you the player/tester, has to play for all 3 players or if you have 3 players in the same room sharing 1 device.

This will enable you to get a feel for the game.

You have the option to tap/click on the Timer button but for now, while learning, I would leave it off.

As stated before, you will soon be able to play against 2 AI bots and eventually we will be able to set up matches where 3 human players can compete against each from all over the world.

Once on here, tap/click on Play.

I hope you enjoy this and will stay tuned for more updates.

Thanks for your time.
